DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine the efficacy and safety of pegaptanib sodium in Japanese patients with wet-type AMD, in order to establish that there is no large difference in the efficacy and the safety of the drug between Western and Japanese patients.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Of EYE001 For Wet-Type AMD (Age-Related Macular Degeneration)
DOC.criteria: Wet AMD, Visual Acuity from 20/320 to 20/40 Diabetic retinopathy, laser coagulation history
